Shrapnel: She talking about us?

The Insecticons all looked at each other.
=

Venom: Hmm.

Barrage: Did you see the way she ruthlessly killed her idiot =
team member like that?

Ransack: I loved that.

Bombshell: Maybe they're th=
e ones.

The Insecticon 7 transform into robot mode.

Venom: Are you thinki=
ng what I'm thinking?...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* =

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2002 9:32 PM
 =
 Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base.


  McGowan narrows her eyes.

  McGow=
an: Well, Shitrons! I guess this dumbass isn't worth saving.

  McGowan sta=
rts to pull the trigger on her gun with the nozzle pressed to Brown's head.=


  Alba throws Pink on the ground.

  McGowan: Hey. Pick it back up.

  Al=
ba ignores McGowan.

  McGowan: You need to-

  Alba: No! McGowan, we shoul=
d have stayed with the Chivtrons!

  McGowan smiles and laughs some.

  McG=
owan: What's that mean?

  Alba: I don't know....But this isn't working.

 =
 McGowan: What do you mean? Look.

  McGowan points to White's corpse.

  M=
cGowan: I killed her. It is working.

  Virgo stared at Alba, feeling trigg=
er happy at the moment. Depp and Lee were ready to step forward when told.
=

  McGowan: Depp, get the robot.

  Depp lifts Pink from the ground and hol=
ds his kitana to her throat. She wakes up but doesn't try to free herself.
=

  Alba: I guess I'll give it some time...

  Lee fires off 5 fireballs, ai=
ming for the chivtron base. Papertron fires of 2 missiles towards the Chivt=
ron base. Birdbot lights the fuse of a bundle of dynamite and tosses it nea=
r the Chivtron base and watches the fuse while growling. Barrymore fires at=
 the Chivtron base twice.

  McGowan: Shitrons! See it with your own eyes!
=

  McGowan points at Depp. Depp holds Pink in front of himself by her arm. =
She reaches for her rifle by Depp cuts her arm off and stabs her in the sto=
mach.

  Alba turns, aiming her gun at McGowan.

  Alba: I gave it enough t=
ime.

  McGowan: Alba, I never did like you.

  Alba shoots McGowan in the =
shoulder instead of the head. She shoots her in the chest twice before McGo=
wan grabs her by the neck. Alba fires at McGowan but misses. McGowan grabs =
ahold of Alba's gun and jerks it from her grip. Alba coughs and struggles t=
o no avail. McGowan tightens her grip. Depp spears Pink through the stomach=
 on his kitana and holds her high in the air. McGowan snaps Alba's neck, dr=
opping her. Virgo looks at the Insecticons.

  Virgo: Kill them....

  Virg=
o spoke in a faint whisper while pointing to the Chivtron base....
    ----=
- Original Message ----- 
    From: Catchphrase: DOCTOR MARIO!!!!!!!!! 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 12:14 AM=

    Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base.


    The Insecticons arrive at th=
e scene of the battle.

    Venom: Hmm.

    Shrapnel: Which side do we att=
ack?

    Barrage: Make it both.

    Ransack: I second that.

    Shrapnel=
: Wait, maybe we can decide whose side would best suit us by how they act a=
nd what they say.

    Venom: I second that one. All in favor of waiting fo=
r their actions to decide who we help and who we destroy, say aye. Those op=
posed say nay

    Shrapnel: Aye

    Bombshell: ...

    Kickback: Maybe w=
e can trick them first, pretend to be on their side and turn on them, or ma=
ke them do our bidding by blackmailing them.

    Bombshell: I have cerebro=
 shells that do that.

    Chop Shop: As long as there's something to steal=
, I'm alright with it.

    Venom: Okay, we're going with Shrapnel's idea, =
then, I'm not waiting all day and neither or any of you!

    They watch th=
e battle...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Rudra656@aol.c=
om 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2002=
 3:46 PM
      Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base.


      ::Aerotaur:: 
  =
          He shrugs and hits a few keys bringing it up on a screen.  He sig=
hs. "It's them again.  And Virgo."  He shakes his head.  "Maybe they'll jus=
t go away if we stay inside."
